This jagged, bony growth narrows to a sharp, pointed tip. Deep groves from some former battle scar its surface. The bearer of a saurian spike often feels a sudden surge in power and confidence.

  • Armor You gain precise scent with a range of 60 feet.
  • Weapon(auditory, emotion, fear, visual) When you cast a polymorph spell by activating the spike, your battle form is exceptionally fearsome. Each enemy in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:60] must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:34] saving throw or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 2} (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 3} on a critical failure).
